OrgName.entry: ARCHER LANE ALLOTMENT AND HOME GARDEN SOCIETY

Desc.entry: Local allotment society with extensive range of composts, fertilisers and plants at lower prices than garden centres. Holds 2 annual shows in September and November.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 2nd Tues in the month at 7pm (committee meeting), Sun 10.30am-12noon (trading hut hours)
